getTypeSignature

public java.lang.String getTypeSignature(org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.SingleVariableDeclaration svDecl)
Retrieves type signature from SingleVariableDeclaration. As SingleVariableDeclaration returns only the clean type in case declaration of type int paraArr[][] is in code the method adds array identifiers for type declaration int this case.

Parameters:
svDecl -
Returns:
the signatyre for the type
